Overview[]: For a cop, Leon seems to be quite incompetent. While waiting for a car in a high-speed pursuit, Leon is shown to be unfocused, thinking about getting a chance to be on a TV show rather than the task at hand, to which Rick tells him to check if he has a round in the gun chamber and the safety off. Rick himself describes Leon as " careless and dumb" when he sees Leon reanimated. However, Rick holds enough respect for Leon to put him down, not wanting to leave him as a walker .
Death[]: Killed By Zombies (Alive) At some point during the outbreak, Leon was bitten by walkers and later reanimated. Rick Grimes (Zombified) A zombified Leon begins clawing the station's fence as Rick, Morgan, and Duane are about to leave the area. Rick comments that he can't leave him as a walker, so he shoots him in the head, putting him down.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the people Leon has killed: 2 unnamed criminals (1 Direct, 1 Alongside his fellow officers, Pre-Apocalypse) Possibly numerous unnamed criminals (Pre-Apocalypse) Possibly a few zombies
Appearances[]: " Days Gone Bye " " Bloodletting " (Flashback, No Lines)
Trivia[]: Leon is the first character in the TV continuity to be seen alive and later zombified in the same episode. Chronologically, Leon is the first named character to be killed by Rick, alive or zombified. He's also chronologically the first named character overall to be killed on-screen, alive or zombified. Linds Edwards , who portrayed Leon, has expressed interest in reprising his role. [1]
Name: Leon Basset
